lum.description: Lighting : lighting conditions in which the accident occurred

agg.description: Localisation : 1 , Out of agglomeration 2 , In built,up areas

vosp.description: Indicates the existence of a reserved lane, regardless of whether or not the accident occurs on that lane

prof.description: Longitudinal profile describes the gradient of the road at the accident site

grav.description: Severity of the accident: The injured users are classified into three categories of victims plus the uninjured

trajet.description: Reason for traveling at the time of the accident

secu.description: on 2 characters:the first concerns the existence of a safety equipment

etatp.description: This variable is used to specify whether the injured pedestrian was alone or not

catv.description: Reason for traveling at the time of the accident
